item.title: Honourable Mention in Top Ten International Web Products of 2009 on RWW
item.description: Wow. Jolie O’Dell just did the Top Ten International Web Products of 2009 on the always brilliant ReadWriteWeb. We didn’t make the Top Ten yet but that’s OK, we’ll be there in 2010 ðŸ™‚ What we did make was the Honourable Mentions list! The only Irish web company to do so. The Golden Spiders award was national recognition for what we’ve been doing this year and now this is global.
